channel.title: 1314Scape X
channel.description:
[center] [size=20pt][u][b]1314Scape X[/b][/u][/size] Website here: [url=http://www.lukesrealm.co.uk/dabord/index.php]Here[/url] ((LINK HAS BEEN APPROVED))
Well ive basicly clean out the crap in sources, and this is my development thread to show you how im getting on!
[u][b]Things Accompleshed[/b][/u]
[ul][li] Removed Antilag.java - no need for it[/li] [li] added itemonitem handler[/li] [li] added magichandler and magiconitem handler[/li] [li] added loadhandler[/li] [li] added restart handler[/li] [li] added commandhandler[/li] [li] added void handler[/li] [li] removed all object's (actions) [/li][li] remove all item on item in client.java [/li] [li] removed all item on objects in client.java[/li] [li] taken out clues - should be a handler[/li] [li] removed all weather - waste of space[/li] [li] cleaned out alot of crap[/li] [li] and some more things i forgot[/li] [li] added firstclicknpc.java[/li] [li] added itemonobject handler [/li] [li] removed alot of skills[/li] [li] added NORMAL teleporthandler[/li] [li] added banmanager[/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li][/ul]
~ LIST WILL BE UPDATED ~
[u][b]Picture:[/b][/u] [img]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/7241/pictureaz5.png[/img]
Supporters:
[ul][li]MEEEEEEEEE![/li] [li]Got java[/li] [li]Planplan[/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[size=70pt] SOURCE RELEASED[/size]
[/center]
